Data is automatically changed, the linear map has not changed.
Just download the system comes with. Buy or sell no response.
Are desktop WPF.

Hi,

Take into account that the Stock Trader RI purpose is to be looked as a reference for building composite applications and it's not meant to be a reference point for building a stock trader application - instead.

You can find more information about this in the Prism documentation at MSDN:

  • Stock Trader Reference Implementation

On the other hand, if you believe this should be changed, you could create a workitem in the Issue Tracker  with your suggestions.

Thanks,

Agustin Adami
